name: Trail Runner (10 Games 10 Weeks)
description:
Trail Runner is a laid-back game about running through the wilderness!

Immerse yourself in the scenery as you run through the forest and among the mountains.  Avoid rocks and fallen trees, or jump off of them for a burst of speed as you try to complete the route in as little time as possible.

This is the sixth entry into my 10 Games in 10 Weeks Challenge.  Follow me on Twitter for daily updates!
